mapper.select: select p.id as postId, m.nickname, p.title, p.contents, p.view_count as viewCount, (select count(post_like.id) from post_like where p.id = post_like.post_id) as likeCount, p.created_at as createdAt, p.post_status as postStatus from post p left join member m on p.member_id = m.id where match(title,contents) against(#{searchWord}) order by p.id desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
